help.title: Record Date
help.body: The record date can generally be found in the upper left hand corner of the record.

help.title: Record Number
help.body: The record number can generally be found in the upper right hand corner of the record.

help.title: Mortgager Name
help.body: The mortgager is often found at the top of the list of hand-entered data. The mortgager tends to be a single person's name. If multiple names are given, enter them all separated by semi-colons.

examples: S. W. corner of 7th Avenue & 25th St. No 226 7th Avenue

help.title: Street Address
help.body: The building address is sometimes labeled "No. of Street or Avenue". When possible, try to interpret the address given using contemporary address conventions.

help.title: Amount Loaned
help.body: The amount loaned is typically found at or near the bottom of the record.

help.title: Valuatation
help.body: Sometimes records include individual, dated valuations of the property and/or building. If any exist in this record, note the most recent.

em_record_valuation.instruction: Enter the last property valuation that was recorded, if any
